agent: Complete Test Generation Pipeline with UI Integration

test_cases.title: Verify User Authentication with Valid Credentials
test_cases.description:
1. Navigate to the PHRS login page.
2. Enter a valid username and password.
3. Click the 'Login' button.
4. Verify that the user is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard.
test_cases.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard.

traceability.requirement_text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

kg_nodes.text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

test_cases.title: Verify User Authorization Based on Role
test_cases.description:
1. Login as a user with the 'Patient' role.
2. Attempt to access the 'Admin' module.
3. Verify that access is denied.
4. Login as a user with the 'Admin' role.
5. Verify that access to the 'Admin' module is granted.
test_cases.expected_result: Access is denied for unauthorized roles and granted for authorized roles.

traceability.requirement_text: Platform uptime shall be 99.9%.

kg_nodes.text: Platform uptime shall be 99.9%.

test_cases.title: Verify Data Encryption at Rest and in Transit
test_cases.description:
1. Upload a file containing sensitive health data.
2. Verify that the file is encrypted at rest in the database.
3. Capture network traffic during data transmission.
4. Verify that the data is encrypted in transit using TLS 1.3.
test_cases.expected_result: Data is encrypted at rest and in transit.

traceability.requirement_text: Platform uptime shall be 99.9%.

kg_nodes.text: Platform uptime shall be 99.9%.

test_cases.title: Verify Password Complexity Requirements
test_cases.description:
1. Attempt to create a new user account with a password that does not meet complexity requirements (e.g., minimum length, special characters).
2. Verify that the system rejects the password and displays an error message indicating the password requirements.
3. Attempt to create a new user account with a password that meets all complexity requirements.
4. Verify that the system accepts the password and creates the account.
test_cases.expected_result: The system enforces password complexity requirements.

traceability.requirement_text: Platform uptime shall be 99.9%.

kg_nodes.text: Platform uptime shall be 99.9%.

test_cases.title: Verify Role-Based Access Control for Data Access
test_cases.description:
1. Create three users: a patient, a doctor, and an administrator.
2. Log in as each user and attempt to access patient data that is not their own.
3. Verify that the patient can only access their own data, the doctor can access their patients' data, and the administrator can access all data.
test_cases.expected_result: Role-based access control is correctly implemented, restricting access to data based on user roles.

traceability.requirement_text: Platform uptime shall be 99.9%.

kg_nodes.text: Platform uptime shall be 99.9%.

test_cases.title: Verify HIPAA Compliance for Data Confidentiality
test_cases.description:
1. Input patient data into the system.
2. Verify that the data is stored securely and accessed only by authorized personnel with appropriate roles.
3. Attempt to access the data without proper authorization.
4. Verify that access is denied and an audit log is created.
test_cases.expected_result: Patient data is stored securely and accessed only by authorized personnel, ensuring HIPAA compliance.

traceability.requirement_text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

kg_nodes.text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

test_cases.title: Verify GDPR Compliance for Data Minimization
test_cases.description:
1. Create a new patient profile.
2. Only enter the minimum required data fields.
3. Verify that the system functions correctly with only the required data.
4. Attempt to add additional, unnecessary data fields.
5. Verify that the system either prevents the addition of unnecessary data or flags it for review.
test_cases.expected_result: The system enforces data minimization principles, ensuring that only necessary data is collected and processed, in compliance with GDPR.

traceability.requirement_text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

kg_nodes.text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

test_cases.title: Verify Data Deletion Functionality for GDPR Compliance
test_cases.description:
1. Create a patient profile with associated health data.
2. Initiate a data deletion request for the patient.
3. Verify that all patient data is permanently deleted from the system within the timeframe specified by GDPR.
4. Attempt to access the deleted data.
5. Verify that the data is no longer accessible.
test_cases.expected_result: Patient data is permanently deleted upon request, ensuring GDPR compliance.

traceability.requirement_text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

kg_nodes.text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

test_cases.title: Verify Consent Management for Data Processing
test_cases.description:
1. Create a new user account.
2. Verify that the user is presented with a clear and understandable consent form for data processing.
3. Verify that the user can provide or withdraw consent for different types of data processing.
4. Verify that the system respects the user's consent preferences and only processes data for which consent has been given.
test_cases.expected_result: The system correctly manages user consent for data processing, ensuring GDPR compliance.

traceability.requirement_text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

kg_nodes.text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

test_cases.title: Verify Audit Logging for HIPAA and GDPR Compliance
test_cases.description:
1. Perform various actions within the system, such as logging in, accessing patient data, and modifying settings.
2. Verify that all actions are logged with relevant details, including the user, timestamp, and action performed.
3. Verify that the audit logs are stored securely and are accessible only to authorized personnel.
4. Generate reports from the audit logs to track user activity and potential security breaches.
test_cases.expected_result: The system provides comprehensive audit logging capabilities, ensuring compliance with HIPAA and GDPR requirements.

traceability.requirement_text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

kg_nodes.text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

test_cases.title: Verify Data Acquisition from Wearables (Heart Rate)
test_cases.description:
1. Connect a compatible wearable device to the PHRS.
2. Ensure the wearable is actively tracking heart rate.
3. Verify that the PHRS successfully acquires heart rate data from the wearable device in real-time.
4. Verify the data accuracy by comparing the data in the PHRS with the wearable device's readings.
test_cases.expected_result: Heart rate data is successfully acquired from the wearable device and displayed accurately in the PHRS.

traceability.requirement_text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

kg_nodes.text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

test_cases.title: Verify Data Import from External Sources
test_cases.description:
1. Prepare a CSV file with sample health data (e.g., blood pressure, cholesterol levels).
2. Attempt to import the CSV file into the PHRS.
3. Verify that the data is successfully imported and displayed correctly in the system.
4. Verify that the system handles invalid data formats gracefully.
test_cases.expected_result: Health data is successfully imported from the CSV file and displayed correctly in the PHRS.

traceability.requirement_text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

kg_nodes.text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

test_cases.title: Verify AI Recommendation Generation
test_cases.description:
1. Input a patient profile with specific health data and lifestyle information.
2. Trigger the AI recommendation engine.
3. Verify that the system generates personalized health recommendations based on the input data.
4. Verify that the recommendations are relevant and accurate.
test_cases.expected_result: Personalized health recommendations are generated based on patient data.

traceability.requirement_text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

kg_nodes.text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

test_cases.title: Verify Health Professional Review of AI Recommendations
test_cases.description:
1. Generate an AI recommendation for a patient.
2. Log in as a health professional.
3. Verify that the health professional can review the AI recommendation.
4. Verify that the health professional can modify or approve the recommendation before it is released to the patient.
test_cases.expected_result: Health professionals can review and approve AI recommendations before release.

traceability.requirement_text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

kg_nodes.text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

test_cases.title: Verify Patient Dashboard Functionality
test_cases.description:
1. Log in as a patient.
2. Verify that the patient dashboard displays relevant health metrics, recommendations, and insights.
3. Verify that the patient can access their health data and modify their profile information.
test_cases.expected_result: Patient dashboard displays relevant information and provides access to health data.

traceability.requirement_text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

kg_nodes.text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

test_cases.title: Verify Wearable API Integration
test_cases.description:
1. Simulate data flow from a wearable API (e.g., Fitbit API).
2. Verify that the PHRS successfully receives and processes the data from the API.
3. Verify that the data is stored correctly in the database.
test_cases.expected_result: PHRS successfully integrates with wearable APIs and processes data.

traceability.requirement_text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

kg_nodes.text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

test_cases.title: Verify Health App API Integration
test_cases.description:
1. Simulate data flow from a health app API (e.g., Apple HealthKit API).
2. Verify that the PHRS successfully receives and processes the data from the API.
3. Verify that the data is stored correctly in the database.
test_cases.expected_result: PHRS successfully integrates with health app APIs and processes data.

traceability.requirement_text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

kg_nodes.text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

test_cases.title: Verify Secure Storage Integration with Cloud Infrastructure
test_cases.description:
1. Verify that the PHRS uses a secure cloud storage service (e.g., AWS S3, Azure Blob Storage).
2. Verify that data stored in the cloud is encrypted at rest.
3. Verify that access to the cloud storage service is restricted to authorized personnel.
test_cases.expected_result: Data is securely stored in the cloud infrastructure with encryption at rest.

traceability.requirement_text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

kg_nodes.text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

test_cases.title: Verify ML Inference Integration
test_cases.description:
1. Send sample data to the ML inference endpoint.
2. Verify that the ML model generates a prediction within the specified timeframe.
3. Verify that the prediction is accurate based on the input data.
test_cases.expected_result: ML inference endpoint generates accurate predictions within the specified timeframe.

traceability.requirement_text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

kg_nodes.text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

test_cases.title: Verify Data Flow Between Modules
test_cases.description:
1. Input patient data into the data acquisition module.
2. Verify that the data is correctly transferred to the AI recommendation engine.
3. Verify that the recommendations are displayed in the patient dashboard.
test_cases.expected_result: Data flows correctly between modules.

traceability.requirement_text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

kg_nodes.text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

test_cases.title: Verify System Response Time for Data Input
test_cases.description:
1. Input a large amount of patient data into the system.
2. Measure the time it takes for the system to process the data.
3. Verify that the processing time is within the specified timeframe (10 seconds).
test_cases.expected_result: The system processes data inputs within 10 seconds.

traceability.requirement_text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

kg_nodes.text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

test_cases.title: Verify Platform Uptime
test_cases.description:
1. Monitor the platform uptime over a period of one month.
2. Verify that the platform uptime is at least 99.9%.
test_cases.expected_result: Platform uptime is at least 99.9%.

traceability.requirement_text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

kg_nodes.text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

test_cases.title: Verify Model Accuracy for Risk Predictions
test_cases.description:
1. Input a set of patient data with known outcomes.
2. Verify that the AI model accurately predicts the outcomes for at least 88% of the patients.
test_cases.expected_result: Model accuracy for risk predictions exceeds 88%.

traceability.requirement_text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

kg_nodes.text: Product Name: AI-Enabled Personalized Health Recommendation System (PHRS)

test_cases.title: Test case 24 for Performance Tests
test_cases.description: Generated test case to meet category requirement for Performance Tests. Validates compliance with requirement REQ-001.
test_cases.expected_result: Test case 24 passes validation
